item.title: We want to quit smoking
item.description: It was a long day and Sean really needed a cigarette, but then he thought back to Columbia’s AI bootcamp, and his classmates, who are also trying to quit, and he thought how disappointed they would be. Consequently he started drinking instead while cursing at Laith. “Why couldn’t I have been a dictator!” he shouted, shaking his fist in the air.

item.title: Babel
item.description: The classmates I’m doing my final project with want to quit. We’re trying to train an LLM to translate text, and the dataset it too large for our CPU and RAM to handle. I don’t want to quit. Knowing what to do with large data sets is enormously important. I’ll give feedback that they ought to include that in the curriculum. So far neither the teacher nor the TAs know what to do, but I’m sure we can figure it out.
